name: In re BRIDGEPORT FIRE LITIGATION. Petition of Donald E. Haviland, Jr., Esquire and the Haviland Law Firm

parties: In re BRIDGEPORT FIRE LITIGATION. Petition of Donald E. Haviland, Jr., Esquire and the Haviland Law Firm.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application for Leave to File Reply in Support of Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED. This matter is referred to the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania for review of petitioners’ conduct.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
23 A.3d 1003
In re BRIDGEPORT FIRE LITIGATION. Petition of Donald E. Haviland, Jr., Esquire and the Haviland Law Firm.
June 13, 2011.
